properties.areaDesc: Lake Huron from 5NM east of Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Lt  to the US/Canadian border beyond 5 NM from shore; Lake Huron from Presque Isle Lt. to Sturgeon Point  MI 5NM off shore to US/Canadian border
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 11 at 3:52PM EST until January 12 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 34 knots from the
northeast with gusts up to 45 knots. The largest significant
waves will be 14 feet with a potential maximum wave height of
20 feet.

* WHERE...Northern Third of Lake Huron.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 12 AM EST Sunday
with the largest waves expected around 1 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow continues through tonight.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST SUNDAY
